DESCRIPTION: Set the mod logs channel on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setvoicelogs [#Channel]** ~ Sets a channel to be used for the voicelogs in your server.
ALIASES: setvoicelogs does not have any aliases
NEED_CHANNEL: You did not provide a channel to use for the voicelogs.
CHANNEL_SET: The {{channel}} has been set for voicelogs on this server.
